kwFilteringDescription: This feature allows bulk update of KW filtering rules based on Opelake data and whether to run on weekends.
genreKeywordDescription: This feature allows bulk update of submit flag, genre settings, and fixed keywords.
templateDescriptionCampaign: Download the template with the current settings first. The template includes Account ID, Account Name, Campaign ID, Campaign Name, and current settings.
templateDescriptionAdgroup: Download the template with the current settings first. The template includes Account ID, Account Name, Campaign ID, Campaign Name, Ad Group ID, Ad Group Name, and current genre settings.
uploadDescription: After filling out the template, upload it here to update the settings.
dragDropFile: Drag and drop a file here, or click to select file
fileTooLarge: File is too large. Maximum size is 5MB.
invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Please upload CSV or Excel files.
invalidInspectionCondition: Inspection condition must be CPA, CPC, or CPM
invalidHolidayExecution: Holiday execution must be ON or OFF
invalidSubmitFlag: Submit flag must be ON or OFF
unexpectedUploadError: An unexpected error occurred during upload.
fileParseError: Error parsing file. Please check the file format.
someFieldsAreMissing: Some required fields are missing or invalid
